remarks: Formula-building rule for restricted existential quantifiers (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 15-Dec-2004.)
statement:
2rexbidva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
2rexbidva $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ps <-> E. x e. A E. y e. B ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph x y $.
